
const uint16_t halbe_periodendauern[] PROGMEM = {
	1908,1805,1700,1607,1515,1432,1351,1275,1204,1136,1072,1012,
	 956, 902, 851, 803, 758, 716, 675, 637, 601, 568, 536, 506,
	 478, 450, 425, 401, 376, 357, 337, 318, 301, 284, 268, 253,
	 238, 225, 212, 200, 189, 178, 168, 159, 150, 142, 134, 126,
};
